resources.string:
Scan and discover bones using arduino to teach kids archeology.

You can find the whole source code of Leonids here:
Do you want to connect to this device ? This setting will be remembered.
We could not connect to device. Are you sure the device is turned on ?
Sorry, bluetooth does not exist on this device. Exiting…
Bluetooth is needed for this app, exiting now
This card is not recognized by this app. Are you sure you are using right cards?
What is the condition of the left forearm?
Only the lower left forearm is fractured.
Only the upper left forearm is fractured.
The left forearm is a mess!
What is the gender of the subject?
The sex of this adult subject is not determinable.
It\'s a child, so it\'s not possible on a skeleton.
What is the condition of the subject\'s teeth?
The subject has a cavity, every other tooth.
It is not possible to estimate the size.
The subject is a child under the age of 10.
He is a teenager between 10 and 15 years old.
He is a teenager between 15 and 20 years old.
This is a Bronze Age vase.
It\'s a sword from the Roman period.
It\'s a pearl necklace from the Merovingian period.
It\'s the same as the one on the back.
What symptom can be seen on the subject\'s tibia?
The subject\'s tibia is very healthy.
Discovery over, let\'s go to the final quizz!
Well played! You have finished the activity
Wait a minute, this element has already been scanned!
You have not scanned all videos yet !
This is not the right card to pass now
You are currently not inside a video
No save has been found, starting with fresh start
Based on all the previous questions, what does the figure in the grave look like?
We are now going to take a picture of the grave !

1. Only the lower left forearm is fractured. 
2. The subject is a woman. 
3. The subject has a cavity.
4. The subject measures approximately 1.65m.
5. He's an adult.
6. It's a pearl necklace from the Merovingian period. 
7. There are two subjects. 
8. Subject has a hole, osteomyelitis (infection).
You are about to quit the app. If you want to quit, press back again
